name: Battle Runner
description: It's time to unleash your inner Warrior! Battle Runner is a casual runner with difficult, random, procedurally generated levels. You're the fighter, travelling to new lands seeking quests, fame and an adventure - time waits for no one so you'll have to run fast, and there will be many obstacles in your way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.6ghz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB Storage: 60 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.6ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB Storage: 60 MB available space
